thread.title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' Home Video Hits Store Shelves Today

author: cbs8
title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' Home Video Hits Store Shelves Today
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE FUNimation
One of the Top Ten All-Time Domestic Anime Releases Now Available Across U.S. & Canada
FLOWER MOUND, Texas , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- North American fans of Dragon Ball Z need to wait no longer. Beginning today, the eagerly anticipated home video release of the summer blockbuster "Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'" is now available at retailers throughout the United States and Canada . This includes all three versions of the home video – the Collector's Edition, Blu-ray/DVD Combo and DVD only. "Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'" entered the history books as the first independent film to make the Top 10 list of highest grossing anime films of all time in the U.S. By the end of its limited theatrical run, the movie grossed more than $8.4 million – surpassing all industry expectations.
"FUNimation is pleased to bring the home video release of Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' to fans so soon after the highly successful theatrical release," said Gen Fukunaga, founder and CEO of FUNimation. "Demand has been just as high as during the theatrical release. The volume of pre-orders has been incredible."
"By joining the top ten anime releases of all time, the Blu-ray Combo Pack is truly a "must-have addition" to fans' collections – not only so they can own this piece of Dragon Ball history, but also due to the movie's unparalleled action, great extra features, and the digital copy," said Mike Duboise , EVP and COO of FUNimation.
The home video release of "Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'" is available in three versions – two of which include 50 minutes of extra features. Details on all three SKUs are as follows:
Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' Collector's Edition (Blu-ray + DVD)
Feature Film (95 minutes) Over 50 minutes of extra features, including: The Voices of Dragon Ball Z (in-the-booth "making of" featurette) The Return of Dragon Ball Z (cast interviews & red carpet footage) Exclusive, premium packaging – including clear o-card and digipack Set of four (4) holographic Frieza Force propaganda postcards Digital HD Ultraviolet copy Suggested Retail Price: $54.98 Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' Blu-ray + DVD Combo
Feature Film (95 minutes) Over 50 minutes of extra features, including: The Voices of Dragon Ball Z (in-the-booth "making of" featurette) The Return of Dragon Ball Z (cast interviews & red carpet footage) Digital HD Ultraviolet copy Suggested Retail Price: $34.98 Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' DVD
Feature Film (95 minutes) Suggested Retail Price: $29.98 Fans can also buy the movie in Digital HD from iTunes, Amazon Instant Video, Xbox Video, PlayStation Network and Google Play.
For more information on "Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'" and the home video release, please visit www.dragonballz.com .
Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/dragonballz & www.facebook.com/funimation , and follow us on Twitter at www.twitter.com/funimation .
About FUNimation Entertainment
FUNimation Entertainment is the leading anime company in North America . FUNimation has a proven formula for launching and advancing brands. They manage a full spectrum of rights for most of their brands including broadcasting, licensing, production, Internet, and home video sales and distribution. For more information about FUNimation Entertainment and its brands, visit www.funimation.com .
